text:
Finding the vertex and zeros of a quadratic function

\begin{array}{l}\nF(x)=a(x-n)^{2}+k \\\n\qquad \begin{array}{l}\n\quad(k-4 x+4)+1-(-4) \\\n\quad=-(x+2)^{2}+5\n\end{array}\n\end{array}[imath]F(x)=a(x-n)^{2}+k [/imath] [imath]\qquad \begin{array}{l}\n\quad(k-4 x+4)+1-(-4) [/imath] [imath]\quad=-(x+2)^{2}+5[/imath]
